CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Date_of_Death__c) ,'', IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Death_Certificate_Document_ID__c ) ) , HYPERLINK("/" &Death_Certificate_Document_ID__c,'View file','_self')& ' ' ,'Upload file' & ' ') & HYPERLINK('/lightning/cmp/c__filePreviewCmp?c__recordId='& Id & '&c__fileType=Death Certificate',IMAGE('/resource/UploadIcon','Upload',20,20) ,'_self'))
CustomField.label: Death Certificate
